column2: ggplot(prop.cross,aes(y = Freq, x = V4, fill=V10)) + geom_col(position = "dodge") + ylab("Proportion") + scale_x_discrete("V4",labels=c("1"="very important","2"="rather important", "3"="not very important","4"="not at all important")) + scale_fill_discrete("V10",labels=c("1"="very happy", "2"="rather happy", "3"="not very happy", "4"="not at all happy")) + theme(legend.position = "top")
